title: Iterate Over Object's Own Properties in Reverse
description: In this lab, we will explore how to iterate over an object's own properties in reverse order using JavaScript. We will use built-in methods such as Object.keys() and Array.prototype.reverse() to achieve this. By the end of this lab, you will have a better understanding of how to work with objects in JavaScript and how to manipulate their properties.

meta.title: Reverse Object Property Iteration | JavaScript Coding Tutorial
meta.description: Learn how to iterate over an object's own properties in reverse order using JavaScript. Explore built-in methods like Object.keys() and Array.prototype.reverse().
meta.keywords: javascript, object, properties, reverse, iteration, coding, tutorial

steps.title: Iterate Over Object's Own Properties in Reverse

verify.name: Verify Node Usage In Zsh History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
